unnormalised: sadhea sope utranichem sangpak zata, foujdari kaido fokot eklea-ekleankuch nhoi, punn eka vatten sompurai somazacher kel'lea apradhancher lakx divpi asta. oxem chintun polleiat: konnem tori ek apradh kela zalear, to fokot ek piddestenakuch tras dina, punn to somazantoli xanti ani surkxa-i bigddaita. haka lagun rajy apradhi monxak kodd'ddent ubho korunk fuddem yeta.
normalised: saadhea bhaxent, zormureche kaido ekach monxak noxekuch divpachem nhoi, punn somazakuch noxen divpi gunheancho vevhar korta. oxem chintat: konnem zorm kel'lean, te ekach pidit monxak tras divpi nhoi, punn somazachem shanti ani suraksha-i bhong kortat. hachek lagun rajy gunhegaracher mukadmo choloita.

unnormalised: bharoti-i foujdari sanhita (IPC), 1860, bhartantlea foujdari kaideacho mull adhar zata. IPC-antlea vibhagant, dekhik, sekxanv 302 (khoon), sekxanv 376 (balatkar), ani sekxanv 420 (fottkireponn), veg-vegllea apradhanchi vixdexi vollokh dita ani tankam zattkai diunche vixim sangta. tem ek vistrut kagodotr zata, zantun bodlot vochunk somazachea mulyank ani ubha ravpi apradhanche prakarant lakx diun bodol kortat, zoxem cybercrime. CrPC, 1973, zaka foujdari prakriya sanhita mhunnui vollkhotat, foujdari kazrannant tpasnni, dhorpachi prakriya, kazram ani appealachi riti sangta.
normalised: bharoti-i dend sanhita (i-pi-si), ek hozar aathshe satt, bhartanlea zormurechea kaideacho adhar zata. i-pi-ci bhitorlea vibhag, jemnche dhoonnshi tin (khun), dhoonnshi satt she (balatkar), ani dhoonnshi chalis (vattonddi), veg-vegllea gunheancho orth sangta ani tanchea khatir shiksha nirdharit korta. ho ek vistrit dastavez asa, ani somazache bodlotlea muliamk darso divpak ani cybercrime sarkhea udetlea gunheak samballpak velovelear sudharonn kortat. si-ar-pi-si, ek hozar nooshe tehattar, zaka zormureche prashniche sanhita mhonntat, zormureche kazaramni topasnni, girftari, troials ani apilakhatir pod'dot manddtta.

unnormalised: FIR vo poilea mahiti-i ahval, ek khup mhotvacho kagodotr. to ek cognizable apradhache tpasnnichem poilem paul (ek apradh zaka pulis adhikari warrant nastanuch dhorunk xakta). konnakui cognizable apradh kel'leachi mahiti asa zalear to laginch aslolea pulis sttaxnant FIR dakholl korunk xakta. SHO vo sttexanv dhonni adhikari FIR nond korpak zababdar asta.
normalised: ef-ai-ar vo poile mahiti riportt ek mahatvacho dastavez asa. to ek olkhichya gunheache topasnnen poilo pagdondd (oso gunho zache khatir pulis odhikari vorrent nastana girftar korunk xakta). olkhichya gunheache utpadnni vixim mahiti axil'lo konn-ui monis lagichea pulis sthexonan ef-ai-ar dakholl korunk xakta. esh-ech-o vo sttexon haus odhikari ef-ai-ar nodnni korpak zobabdar asa.

unnormalised: foujdari kazrannank sadharanponnan cognizable vo non-cognizable mhunn vargikrit kortat. poilim sanglam tea bhaxen, cognizable kazrannant, pulis apradhi monxak warrant nastanuch dhorunk xaktat, zalear non-cognizable kazrannant, magistrate koddsun warrant zai poddtta. tea xivai, apradhank bail mellpi vo bail mellonk xokona oxeui vargikrit kortat. bail mellpi apradhant, apradhi monxak bail mellonk hakk asta, zalear bail mellonk xokona oxea apradhant, bail korttachea nirnnoyacher adharit asta.
normalised: zormureche kazaram sodarponn olkhichim vo olkhichim nhoi mhonn vargikrit kortat. mukhar sanglam tea promann, olkhichea kazaramni, pulis vorrent nastana gunhegarak girftar korunk xakta, zorui olkhichea nhoi kazaramni, ek nyayadhisha koddsun vorrent zai poddtta. toxench gunhe bail-able vo bail-able nhoi mhonn-ui vibhag korunk xakta. bail-able gunheamni, gunhegarak jaminichi hakki asta, zorui bail-able nhoi gunheamni, jamin nyaylayachem vevechharacher dharun asta.

unnormalised: prasekyuxanvchem kortovy apradhi monxacho gunhao "sanzay unna axil'lea zonnelancho" mhunn sidh korop. hacho orth asa dixtti poddlolem praman itlem bollaxali asa ki konnachench monis apradhichea gunheak vixvass dharnar na. sidh korpacho bhar purnnponnan prasekyuxanvacher asta; apradhi monxak nirapradhi mantat je meren to gunhegar mhunn sidh zanvcho na.
normalised: mukadmyachi zobabdari "vazib dhuveranchi bailek" gunhegarichi doka sid'dh korop asa. hacho orth asa sadarponn monxeak gunhegarichi doka vixim duddo asloli mahiti khub mahatvachi ani nirdharit axunk zai. purnn dokyachi zobabdari mukadmyacher asta; gunhegar doko zaun sid'dh korponam to poriant nirapraddi mantat.

unnormalised: defens lauyer, dusre vatten, apradhichem pratinidhitv korta ani tanchea bhagintli khobor sangta. tim sakxidarank tpasnni kortat, praman dixtti poddtta, ani tanchea clientache vatten vad kortat. to dhyan divnk zata ki apradhi monxak nispakx kazrak poddtta ani tanche hak rakhun dovortat.
normalised: rakxonnn vokil, dusrea vatten, gunhegarachi pratinidhtai korta ani tanne sangopachi vattoi mandar korta. tim sakxidaranchi toksanni kortat, mahiti mandar kortat ani tanchea vokila vatin vadd ghaltat. gunhegarak nixttur chokxanni labhon ani tanche hakki samballon te tanchem kam asa.

unnormalised: ek sesxans kortt sadharanponnan vhodd foujdari kazrannank sambhalltta, zoxem khoon, balatkar, ani dakoiti. mejistrett kortt unnea apradhank sambhalltta. unch kortt unnea korttanchea appealank aikota, ani bhartachem uchch tomachnachem kortt nimnnem korttachem appeal zata. atam meren sumar kes dakholl zaleat ani ekunntarun 1500 kes maharaxhtrant fakt pattlea mhoinneant nond zaleat. halim hea kesincher nirnnoy favo zaunk asa.
normalised: ek seshonn kortt sadarponn vhoddlea zormurechea kazarancho vevhar korta, jemnche khun, balatkar ani dakoiti. mejistrett kortt unnea gunheancho vevhar kortat. uchch nyayaloi unnea korttankoddsun apill aikota ani bharotachem sarv uchch nyayaloi apilachem akhirachem kortt asa. choddkam kazaranchi nodnni hea vorsak kaide khala kelea, jeamni kamit kamit ek hozar panchshek mazharashrtrakoddsun bhorti kelea te patlleak ani hache vorvim nirdhar vicharacho asunk zai.

unnormalised: foujdari kaideache buniyadi vollokhin nagrikank tanchea hak ani zababdare vixim odhik zagrut zata. tem odhik mahiti asloli ani bhag gheupi nagriktayechi vatt dakhovta, ji eka bori demokresik khup gorjechi zata.
normalised: zormurechea kaideachya mull sadhna somzopnagiri nagrikank tanchea hakki ani zobabdaream vixim zaitich bodhtai divnk xokta. toxench te zaitich mahitigar ani vyavsayik nagrikatvak posonn divnk xakta, ji ek nirogi lokxahik mahatvachi asa.
